verbose_text: Previous studies have demonstrated that PK activity of PKM2, not PKM1, is modulated by the allosteric activators FBP, serine and SAICAR; tyrosine peptide binding and posttranslational modifications such as acetylation, phosphorylation and oxidation XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PK activity of PKM2, not PKM1, is modulated by the allosteric activators FBP
